name: Magnetic Core Memory
description: Early random-access memory technology. Multiplies pixel generation by 1.14x.

name: DRAM Memory Chip
description: Dynamic Random Access Memory improves processing efficiency. Multiplies pixel generation by 1.35x.

name: VIC-II Graphics Chip
description: Video Interface Controller from the C64. Multiplies pixel generation by 1.7x.

name: SID Sound Chip
description: Sound Interface Device enhances system performance. Multiplies pixel generation by 2.05x.

name: Parallel Processing Unit
description: Process multiple pixel operations simultaneously. Multiplies pixel generation by 2.4x.

name: RISC Architecture
description: Reduced Instruction Set Computing for efficiency. Multiplies pixel generation by 3.5x.

name: Superscalar Architecture
description: Multiple instruction pipelines in parallel. Multiplies pixel generation by 7x.

name: Dual Core Processor
description: Two processing cores on a single chip. Multiplies pixel generation by 14x.

name: Quad Core Processor
description: Four processing cores working in tandem. Multiplies pixel generation by 35x.

name: Octa-Core Processor
description: Eight processing cores for extreme performance. Multiplies pixel generation by 70x.

name: Quantum Computing Array
description: Harnesses quantum mechanics for unparalleled processing power. Multiplies pixel generation by 700x.

name: Neural Network Processor
description: Artificial intelligence for advanced pixel generation. Multiplies pixel generation by 3500x.

name: Holographic Display
description: Advanced display technology for immersive pixel rendering. Multiplies pixel generation by 7000x.

name: Dark Matter Processor
description: Utilizes dark matter for unimaginable processing speeds. Multiplies pixel generation by 70000x.

name: Dyson Sphere
description: A megastructure that captures energy from a star. Multiplies pixel generation by 700000x.
